name: Balade
description:
Take a walk through a procedurally generated fictional French city. Can you find all the historic monuments?

There's no sound but you can play something like this in the background

or if you prefer, I made a short, scattershot Spotify playlist: http://open.spotify.com/user/gapgen/playlist/02mOdwsyMNCnggOpJN0fRy

WINDOWS: Download balade_win.zip and run balade.exe in the main folder

OTHERS: If you have Python installed, you can download balade_src.zip and run "python balade.py". It needs pygame, numpy and scipy.

Comments/bug reports to @eegnsma on Twitter. If the game crashes, send me the log.txt file in the main folder.

Thanks to Christophe Beaumale for the font Cursif
